name: Attuned_Fury_of_the_Gladiator_A
display_name: Attuned Fury of the Gladiator A
display_fullname: Boosts.Attuned Fury of the Gladiator A
display_help: Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and accuracy by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%. NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses. You get the set bonuses not marked "(PvP)" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.
